ENGLISH: There's no time to enjoy your little creature that a huge sense of emptiness hits you. Within you, you know that this might be the last of your children …
ITALIAN: Neanche il tempo di gioire della tua piccola creatura che un enorme senso di vuoto t'assale. Dentro di te, sai che questo potrebbe essere l'ultimo dei tuoi figli...

ENGLISH: When an elf marries another one, he links his spirit, his fea, to that of his new spouse. Thus, he can't remarry, even after her husband disappears.
FRENCH: Lorsqu'un elfe se marie, il lie son esprit à celui de son nouveau conjoint. Ainsi, il ne peut plus se remarier, même une fois que son conjoint disparait.
Nos esprits sont liés pour toujours.
ITALIAN: I nostri spiriti saranno collegati per sempre.
